message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $87 is my final offer. It's a great price for this product.
I appreciate your time, Alice, but I'm afraid I have to stick to my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. That's my final offer.
